page.shortlink: ux controlbar items disclosure settings margin top property
page.description: Defines the disclosure bottom top. This setting is optional.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Margin - top]* property can be used to change the top margin for the disclosure. The *[ui:Margin - top]* is defined using CSS units. If no unit is specified, the value is assumed to be pixels. '%' is not supported.
